title: New design for Jami on desktop (Linux, macOS, Windows) - News - Jami Forum
text: Hello everyone and happy new year 2026, We’ve been working on a design refresh of the Jami Qt client, which is the version of Jami used on GNU/Linux, macOS, and Windows. The new design is already available for testing on macOS (non-app store beta version) and Flatpak (beta) on GNU/Linux, and should be published on all other beta channels in the next few days. There is still time for us to improve the design and fix remaining issues before the new version is published. This testing period is the best time for the community to provide feedback, report regressions and give your opinion on the new UI.
